00001 /* memdep-lwt.cpp: Load Wait Table [Alpha 21264, R.E. Kessler, IEEE Micro 1999] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 #define COMPONENT_NAME "lwt"
00006 
00007 #ifdef MEMDEP_PARSE_ARGS
00008 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00009 {
00010   int num_entries;
00011   int reset_interval;
00012            
00013   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d",name,&num_entries,&reset_interval) != 3)
00014     fatal("bad memdep options string %s (should be \"lwt:name:num_entries:reset_interval\")",opt_string);
00015   return new memdep_lwt_t(name,num_entries,reset_interval);
00016 }
00017 #else
00018 
00019 class memdep_lwt_t:public memdep_t
00020 {
00021   protected:
00022   int num_entries;
00023   char * array;
00024   int reset_interval;
00025   tick_t last_reset;
00026   int mask;
00027 
00028   public:
00029   memdep_lwt_t(char * arg_name,
00030                int arg_num_entries,
00031                int arg_reset_interval
00032               )
00033   {
00034     init();
00035 
00036     last_reset = 0;
00037 
00038     /* verify arguments are valid */
00039     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_num_entries);
00040     CHECK_POS(arg_reset_interval);
00041 
00042     name = strdup(arg_name);
00043     if(!name)
00044       fatal("couldn't malloc lwt-memdep name (strdup)");
00045     type = strdup("lwt-memdep");
00046     if(!type)
00047       fatal("couldn't malloc lwt-memdep type (strdup)");
00048 
00049     num_entries = arg_num_entries;
00050     reset_interval = arg_reset_interval;
00051 
00052     mask = num_entries-1;
00053     array = (char*) calloc(num_entries,sizeof(array));
00054     if(!array)
00055       fatal("couldn't malloc lwt-memdep lwt table");
00056 
00057     bits = num_entries + (int)ceil(log(reset_interval)/log(2.0)); /* plus extra counter to track cycles */
00058   }
00059 
00060   /* DESTROY */
00061   ~memdep_lwt_t()
00062   {
00063     free(array); array = NULL;
00064   }
00065 
00066   /* LOOKUP */
00067   MEMDEP_LOOKUP_HEADER
00068   {
00069     int index = PC&mask;
00070 
00071     MEMDEP_STAT(lookups++;)
00072 
00073     if((sim_cycle - last_reset) >= reset_interval)
00074     {
00075       memset(array,0,num_entries*sizeof(*array));
00076       last_reset = sim_cycle - (sim_cycle % reset_interval);
00077     }
00078 
00079     if(array[index]) /* predict wait */
00080       return !sta_unknown;
00081     else
00082       return true;
00083   }
00084 
00085   /* UPDATE */
00086   MEMDEP_UPDATE_HEADER
00087   {
00088     MEMDEP_STAT(updates++;)
00089 
00090     if((sim_cycle - last_reset) >= reset_interval)
00091     {
00092       memset(array,0,num_entries*sizeof(*array));
00093       last_reset = sim_cycle - (sim_cycle % reset_interval);
00094     }
00095 
00096     int index = PC&mask;
00097     array[index] = true;
00098   }
00099 };
00100 
00101 #endif /* MEMDEP_PARSE_ARGS */
00102 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
